channel.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
channel.description:
ok my friend has a laptop and it has so many virus's and trojens its not even funny theres even more of a problom, it cant access the internet and doesent have an anti-virus the only way you can really do much on the computer is in safe mode, what can i do?
how can i format it?

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @ada ada
item.description:
@ada wrote:

Borrow your friends cd

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.dc:creator: @cow822 cow822
item.description:
@cow822 wrote:

He said he dosn’t have the cd read! Try downloading something on a diff computer and burning the program to a disk or a flash drive.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.description:
@ada wrote:

Just get your windows cd, boot from it, and follow the instructions.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

You could try putting some anti virus and spyware programs on the laptop with a flashdrive. If that doesn’t work then just get a copy of windows somehow burnt or not and use it to format.

Read full topic

item.description:

If no cd at present, download it and burn to a disk and take it to your friends.

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

As far as I know you can’t format without the disk. I mean you could try to boot up in safe mode then virus scan.

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:8, topic:33847”]Oh thats easy then:

del C:\*.*

Doesn’t format the drive, just deletes every single file on it.[/quote]

YOU CAN’T FORMAT/DELETE THE DRIVE YOUR ON AND EVEN IF YOU COULD IT WOULD SCREW YOUR PC.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Oh thats easy then:

del C:\*.*

Doesn’t format the drive, just deletes every single file on it.

Read full topic

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You didn’t read a word I said.

The Un-Named:

you can’t format the drive your on.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

[quote=“mvp566, post:3, topic:33847”]ok i put format C: and is asked if i was sure then it said this

[quote]dormat cannot run because the volume is in use by another
proccess. format may run if this colume is dismounted first.
ALL OPENED HANDLES TO THIS VOLUME WHOLD THEN BE INVALID.
would you like to force a dismount on this volume? (Y/N)[/quote]

then i Typed Y and it went away and nothing happend…

what now?[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Just make sure you know how to reinstall the drivers for your gfx card ect.

Insert the windows disk and format. Not format C:, you can’t format the drive your on.

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

item.title: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom
item.dc:creator: @mvp566 mvp566
item.description:
@mvp566 wrote:

i did that earlier it did somthing wierd.

ill try again

EDIT: ok i put format C: and is asked if i was sure then it said this

dormat cannot run because the volume is in use by another proccess. format may run if this colume is dismounted first. ALL OPENED HANDLES TO THIS VOLUME WHOLD THEN BE INVALID. would you like to force a dismount on this volume? (Y/N)

then i Typed Y and it went away and nothing happend…

what now?

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help, HUGE Computer Problom

Go to command line and type

“FORMAT C:”
